summary: All vanilla skyrim map markers are shown as visible.. as in you can see them all from the start of the game but you cannot fast travel to any of them untill you find them.
descriptionHtml:
You can see them all so it should be easy to find places you have not been to yet as they will be shaded grey icons not white

this screen shot was taken on a brand new save with the mod random alternate start so that why i am in the middle of a bunch of unfound markers.

If your current save allready has used tmm 1 and has all marker visible as white icons you will most likly need to do tmm 0 then upload this.

sorry about the lack of description and screenshots.
if you enjoy clicking on link's
check out steam its been their for ages:>  [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=205648882]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=205648882
[/url]
Theirs also a dragonborn map marker version on steam here:>   [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=205449612]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=205449612[/url]
if your interested for the time being

*Sorry no dawnguard support yet.
author: themathewglen Steam - glennnnhearn nexus
